sorcer.core.provider

Interface FileStorer


  • public interface FileStorer
    The file store interface to access remote directories.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • getDirectories

        java.lang.String getDirectories(DocumentDescriptor docDesc)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Lists all directories available on the file store.

        The format is:

        • # is the path separator
        • / is the separator between args

        Example: /test/test#bla

        Parameters:
        desc - Only Principal is used.
        Returns:
        a list of all directories.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.io.IOException

      • getDirectoryContent

        java.lang.String getDirectoryContent(DocumentDescriptor desc)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Returns the content of a directory.

        The components are separeted with a /. Only files and no directories are listed.

        Parameters:
        desc - DocumentDescriptor. FolderPath and Principal are user. FolderPath uses # as a Path separator.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.io.IOException

                                 java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException
